section.heading: Voluntary dissolution before commencement of activity.
section.text: A majority of the organizers or initial directors of a limited cooperative association that has not yet begun business activity or the conduct of its affairs may dissolve the association.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 1204 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
This section is referenced in § 29-1012.02 and § 29-1012.05.
